title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After following the steps to import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the file 'image1.jpg' from the outline image, and renaming 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg', the refreshed image does not appear in the layout view.
EB: After following the steps to import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the file 'image1.jpg' from the outline image, and renaming 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg', the refreshed image should appear in the layout view.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the file 'image1.jpg' from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg'.
4. Verify that the refreshed image appears in the layout view.
